name: Mind & Corpses
description:
Mind and Corpse is a twin stick shooter where you control a Guy in a office invaded by a horde of zombies. To get out of it, our friend will have to learn to separate his mind from his body to defeat the walking corpses.

Controls:

Move with QASD / ZQSD / Arrows.

Aim with the Mouse.

Shoot with Left Click.

And separate your body & mind with Space, you can still control both!

Global GameJam 2022 with Dralok, Sugiuro, and Yarimoto
